title: Battlefield V Free Download Direct Link
description:
This is the ultimate Battlefield V experience. Enter mankind’s greatest conflict across land, air, and sea with all gameplay content unlocked from the get-go. Choose from the complete arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and gadgets, and immerse yourself in the hard-fought battles of World War II. Stand out on the battlefield with the complete roster of Elites and the best customization content of Year 1 and Year 2
Battlefield V Definitive Edition contains the Battlefield V base game and the definitive collection of content: All gameplay content (weapons, vehicles, and gadgets) from launch, Year 1, and Year 2 84 immersive outfit variations for the British and German armies to enhance the WWII sandbox

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1050 / NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 660 2GB
